page.title: 07Bondleigh Farm Management.
page.content: {Nitrogen,}Phosphate and Potash granular compound fertilzers used for arable and grassland with additional nitrogen applications applied by spinner.{Farmyard manure and slurry } where available, with periodic applications of ground limestone help to maintain Ph. balance of soil. {Land drainage.}Various size continuous length perforated plastic pipe used inplace of previously used clay pipe layed end to end. Many old stone drains can still be found. {Hedges}Trimmed by flail machines for uniformity, encouraging growth of new vegetation. Hedge casting and laying is now a dying craft as more of our hedges are replaced by{wire fences. } Previous hedges ascertained by presence of large trees standing in majestic solitude.
